page.title: 02BARLASTON -RECREATION
page.content: The recreational facilities in the area include a{country club}which has a nine hole golf course,squash courts, a lake for trout fishing, caravan campsite restaurant and bar. On Tuesday and Wednesday evenings, however girls aged between 4 and 16 have{ballet lessons}on the dance floor of the large dining room.Each lesson lasts for an hour and the girls take the examinations of the{Royal Academy {of Dance. } Barlaston have a traditional cricket green and wooden club house hidden away in the heart of the village.Yoga enthusiasts meet in the village hall as do the women's institute. This building is also used for social functions such as wedding receptions and Saturday night dances. The Duke Of York public house is reputed to have the best dumplings!
